bio:
Creative, results driven technology leader with 15 years of proven CTO/CIO/IT Director experience.  Change agent and problem solver with a passion for technology: skilled in grasping the bigger picture, conceptualising, developing and implementing solutions, and partnering closely with C-level business leaders.  Excels in developing, motivating and mentoring highly focussed teams that successfully meet and exceed organisational objectives.
 
• Executive Leadership and Communications
• Enterprise Systems Planning and Integration
• Strategic Planning and Change Management
• Budgeting and Cost Control
• Organisation and Staff Development
• Staff Management and Team Building
• Business Re-engineering
• Programme Management and Turnarounds
David tells it straight. He is driven by a fundamental belief in ethics and honesty – offering his employers, partners, and associates direct viewpoints on where the business stands.He is a highly successful troubleshooter with a significant track record
